descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
Hello everybody,

this is my retexture mod of NikitaaÂ´s Demothris armor.
I create HD textures 
and i also replace the 3D model of the boots with (IMHO) a better looking
model from Kurese R18 Argend armor.
Its a light armor with the status og the glass armor.
The armor is located in a chest in Solitude next to the execution place (see picture)

For more infomation look at the original mod from Nikitaa
[color=yellow] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14399 [/color]

Update log
New Version 2.1 with smaller textures but same quallity,faster loading,better light effects
and better ornaments

Have fun
Endorse if you like this mod

you can also upload your own pictures

[/size]

[color=yellow]
You can also have a look of my other mods

 REVENGE armor by Ilias- Blades Retexture for male and female
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19186/

Retexture of R18Pn 07 - Torumekian Armor for CBBEV3 and UNP
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18373/

Fiora Armor Set RETEXTURED
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14439/

R18 Argent Armour for CBBE V3 and UNP RETEXTURE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13406/

[/color]
author: Ilias
